welcome_message_body: Welcome to Laohekou, a charming city known for its rich history and beautiful natural surroundings. We hope you enjoy your time here and explore all that this wonderful city has to offer.

restaurants.name: 汉水鱼坊
restaurants.description: 汉水鱼坊 is a chinese restaurant located in 襄樊市.
restaurants.address: 中山路 (公园北路), 襄樊市, 湖北

restaurants.name: 快乐老家大酒店
restaurants.description: 快乐老家大酒店 is a chinese restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 巴蜀鱼庄
restaurants.description: 巴蜀鱼庄 is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: 春乐宴
restaurants.description: 春乐宴 is a chinese restaurant located in Laohekou.
restaurants.address: 百货大楼隔壁, Laohekou, 湖北

restaurants.name: 新半条江鱼庄
restaurants.description: 新半条江鱼庄 is a chinese restaurant located in Laohekou.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Guanghua Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
